roleset.name: release liquids

example.name: senseless violence
example.text: After Mary hit him, John's nose streamed blood for a week.

example.name: more senseless violence
example.text: After Mary hit him, John's nose streamed with blood for a week.

roleset.note: Comparison with 'pour'. Member of Vncls substance_emission-43.4. Frames file for 'stream' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: move like water

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: About $60 million streamed out last week alone, double the level of the week following last month's Campeau Corp. credit squeeze.
example.arg: double the level of the week following last month's Campeau Corp. credit squeeze

roleset.note: Comparison with 'flow'. Member of Vncls, appear-48.1.1.

roleset.name: send data in real time over the internet
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. NO VNcls.

example.name: arg1, LOC
example.text: [All 17 episodes of the original The Prisoner]-1 can be streamed *-1 at AMC 's Web site .
example.note: There might be some debate over whether AMC's Web site is the source or even the destination, but because there may be different ways to look at this, we follow the preposition directly and call it LOC.

example.name: with arg2 and a bunch of arm Ms
example.text: FWIW, I streamed the "Hunger Games" yesterday in 1080p, Dolby 5.1, from Amazon Instant Streaming (there's a free Xbox app for it) without any delay at all.
example.arg: from Amazon Instant Streaming (there's a free Xbox app for it)

example.name: with arg3
example.text: The Whiskey Boys played a house concert on Friday night and streamed it to the internet via Google Hangouts On Air for all to see.
